quest.name: Close to Home
journal: Momodi, the proprietress of the Quicksand, wants you to perform three tasks that will help you learn the fundamentals of adventuring.
Momodi has given you three tasks to perform. Should you encounter any citizens who seem to be in need of help as you make your way around Ul'dah, why not offer your services?
You have completed all three tasks. Report back to Momodi at the Quicksand.
Momodi explains that the three locations you visited will feature prominently in your adventuring life. Heed well her advice, and travel further afield as your experience grows.
objectives: Attune yourself to the aetheryte found inside the city.
Listen to Seseroga's explanation of the markets.
Report to Momodi at the Quicksand.

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: Before you go chargin' off to find your fortune, I've a few basic tasks I'd like you to perform so as to help you get to know the place.

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: First of all, I want you to visit the aetheryte plaza. To get there, head west from here till you reach Emerald Avenue, then look to the north. You should see a giant, floatin' crystal called an aetheryte.

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: If it weren't for aetherytes, travelin' around Eorzea would be a damn sight more troublesome than it is. 'Course, you still need to attune with 'em before you can use 'em, so be sure to do that with the one in the plaza. You ever attuned with an aetheryte before, Forename? If not, just lay your hand on the thing and you'll see what I mean.

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: When you've done that, I want you to pay a visit to the Gladiators' Guild, over at the Coliseum.

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: Assumin' that sword ain't just for show, you might consider trainin' there.

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: And finally, I want you to visit the Sapphire Avenue Exchange, over on the Steps of Thal.

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: Goods from all across Eorzea and beyond turn up there every day. You'll have no trouble findin' armor, weapons, or anythin' else a fledglin' adventurer like yourself might need.

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: You might say that everythin's for sale here in Ul'dah─as long as you've got the gil.

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: Just make sure as you don't pay more than you ought, Forename.

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: There's plenty as won't scruple to swindle unsuspectin' foreigners like yourself, 'specially if they think no one's lookin' out for their best interests.

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: Which is why I'm givin' you this letter. When you visit the exchange, find a gentleman named Seseroga and give it to him. He'll be happy to tell you about the markets once he's read it.

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: In short, then: visit the aetheryte plaza, the Gladiators' Guild, and the Sapphire Avenue Exchange. Simple.

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: Oh, but before you go, a word of advice: while there're more than a few unsavory characters out there who'll try to take advantage of you, there are also some with honest-to-goodness problems who you should consider offerin' a helpin' hand to.

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: A lot of folk are lured to this city by the promise of wealth and power. What many of 'em fail to realize is that instead of chasin' after gil the moment they get here, they ought to be makin' friends.

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: Let it be known that you're willin' to give as much as you get, and opportunities will come your way.

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: Speakin' of which, you should speak with the Smith over yonder─those lads always have some good advice for up-and-comin' adventurers. Otherwise, that's about it from me. It's past time you got goin'. Oh, and let me know when you've finished, will you? That way, I won't spend my days worryin' that you're down to your smallclothes without a gil to your name.

dialogue.name: LULUTSU
dialogue.text: Welcome to the Gladiators' Guild, friend!

dialogue.name: LULUTSU
dialogue.text: Tell me, are you new to the thrills of mortal combat? Well, whether you are or not, you are new to us!

dialogue.name: LULUTSU
dialogue.text: If you would take your place in these hallowed halls, you must be willing and ready to undergo the most rigorous training. You must endure cuts and bruises beyond counting, and like as not far worse.

dialogue.name: LULUTSU
dialogue.text: A daunting prospect, I concede─but there is no other way if you mean to take to the bloodsands one day. And why wouldn't you? The Coliseum is only the most celebrated place of public entertainment in all of Ul'dah!

dialogue.name: LULUTSU
dialogue.text: Where else could a poor man amass a fortune so vast as to one day allow him to claim a seat on the Syndicate?

dialogue.name: LULUTSU
dialogue.text: Ahhh...there's not an Ul'dahn alive who isn't inspired by the rise of the self-made man.

dialogue.name: LULUTSU
dialogue.text: And there is no truer embodiment of this than the gladiator who wins riches and fame with his sword.

dialogue.name: LULUTSU
dialogue.text: Throughout its long and storied history, this guild has nurtured countless champions.

dialogue.name: LULUTSU
dialogue.text: Our training methods are second to none, and our members ever strive to develop new techniques.

dialogue.name: LULUTSU
dialogue.text: If you desire true glory─to fight and triumph, 'midst the roar of ten thousand voices─then this is where you belong, adventurer.

dialogue.name: LULUTSU
dialogue.text: ...Think of it. Think of your legacy. And if your soul stirs...join us.

dialogue.name: NENEBARU
dialogue.text: Hail, adventurer! Might you have come at the behest of Miss Momodi of the Quicksand?

dialogue.name: NENEBARU
dialogue.text: Excellent. Which brings us to the matter of the attunement fee─that will be one hundred thousand gil, if you please, madamsir.

dialogue.name: NENEBARU
dialogue.text: ...AHAHAHAHAHA! Apologies, but I do so relish the opportunity to make that jest. The look on your face was absolutely priceless! Ah, but the fact that you were so easily deceived suggests to me that you are unfamiliar with the use of aetherytes. Allow me to explain.

dialogue.name: NENEBARU
dialogue.text: These crystalline agglomerations tap into aetherial energies, and are primarily used as a means to travel swiftly from one place to another.

dialogue.name: NENEBARU
dialogue.text: Perchance you have heard of Return and Teleport? Well, these transportation spells make direct use of the aetherytes and their connection to the flow of aether.

dialogue.name: NENEBARU
dialogue.text: Given that there is an aetheryte in almost every corner of Eorzea, any adventurer with a mind to explore the realm will wish to seek out and attune herselfhimself to each and every one!

dialogue.name: NENEBARU
dialogue.text: But even if you have no intention of wandering beyond the sultanate's borders, it would be prudent for you to attune yourself to any aetherytes you encounter from now on.

dialogue.name: NENEBARU
dialogue.text: I pray you found that informative. Should you wish to learn more about aetherytes or transportation magic, I should be happy to answer your questions.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text:
You attune with the aetheryte.
You are now able to use the Return spell!

dialogue.name: SESEROGA
dialogue.text:
And you are?
...Ho, a newly come adventurer. But of course. Yes, I am Seseroga. What can I do for you?

dialogue.name: SESEROGA
dialogue.text: Ah, you would have me teach you the ways of the marketplace? Very wise. As for my fee... What? You expect me to do it for free!? Surely you jest.

dialogue.name: SESEROGA
dialogue.text: My dear adventurer, when you ask an Ul'dahn for a favor, you should at least try to make it worth his while. Judging by your garb, I rather doubt you could afford my services, but the fact you offer nothing is laughable.

dialogue.name: SESEROGA
dialogue.text: Oh. Mistress Momodi instructed you to seek me out, did she? Hmph. Consider yourself fortunate to have such influential friends.

dialogue.name: SESEROGA
dialogue.text: I shall be brief, and you shall be attentive.

dialogue.name: SESEROGA
dialogue.text: You stand in the Sapphire Avenue Exchange, the busiest and most profitable marketplace in the sultanate.

dialogue.name: SESEROGA
dialogue.text: Being advantageously situated in relation to the other city–states, Ul'dah's markets have ever served as both the literal and figurative centers of Eorzean commerce.

dialogue.name: SESEROGA
dialogue.text: All the great overland trade routes lead to our city, and the majority of maritime trade between Vylbrand and Aldenard passes through our ports.

dialogue.name: SESEROGA
dialogue.text: Because of this, countless companies and consortia have chosen Ul'dah as their base of operations. They see to it that this marketplace is awash with merchants and moneylenders, day and night.

dialogue.name: SESEROGA
dialogue.text: Anything a man could ever desire can be purchased here─provided as he has sufficient funds.

dialogue.name: SESEROGA
dialogue.text: Surely there's something you seek, adventurer? A deadlier sword, perhaps, or a shinier trinket? Whatever it is you want, the exchange will have it.

dialogue.name: SESEROGA
dialogue.text: To the north, you will find merchants peddling armor and accessories, curatives and crafting materials.

dialogue.name: SESEROGA
dialogue.text: And to the south, you will find weapons, tools, and an assortment of other useful items for sale.

dialogue.name: SESEROGA
dialogue.text: Seek out a particular merchant, or browse to your heart's content. But do try to remain aloof should you find something that piques your interest. Decisions made in the heat of the moment are usually unwise, especially where coin is concerned.

dialogue.name: SESEROGA
dialogue.text: Ahem. That is all the complimentary aid you shall have from me─and far too much for my taste.

dialogue.name: SESEROGA
dialogue.text: My regards to Momodi. Now, off with you!

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: How was your tour of the city, Forename? Get lost, did you?

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: Aye, well, Ul'dah's a big place with lots to see and do─but wanderin' around aimlessly don't pay the bills. If you're serious about makin' a livin' here, you'll need to remember where things are.

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: So when you go explorin', explore like you've got a purpose, eh?

dialogue.name: MOMODI
dialogue.text: All right, then! All that's left is for you to work hard, make money, and spend it here at the Quicksand!
